name: Knights & Swords
description:
The game is about a robot who goes back in time. He is then captured and sent to duel against the onslaught of knights.

They make the robot fight a set amount of rounds, where the number of knights increases, but to give the robot a fighting chance, they allow them to shop and buy different upgrades.

Can you kill all knights that stand in your path and make it back to your time? Or will you die a robot out of time?
